# INImageNoteContent

**Class**

An image contained in a note.

## Declaration

```swift
class INImageNoteContent
```

## Initializing the Image

- **init(image:)**: Initializes the object with the specified image.

## Getting the Image

- **image**: An image contained in a note.

## Note Objects

- **INNote**: The content and metadata associated with a single note entry in your app.
- **INNoteContent**: An abstract class that defines the types of content contained in notes.
- **INTextNoteContent**: The textual content of a note.

## Inherits From

- INNoteContent

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
